Majors: 3D Animation, Motion Graphics and Adobe CC

ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~~~~~   is experienced in:  Information Technology (Gaming); and Manufacturing.    ~~~~~~~~~~~~   has 13 years of work experience.

Positions.Description:
• Designed and animated Motion Graphics for various clients on Contract/Freelance assignments.
• Utilized the Adobe CC 2019 for video editing and special effects.  Incorporated the use of Cinema 4D.

• Designed and animated Motion Graphics for Pioneer Natural Resources.
• Created custom animations for E-Learning training programs such as safety, finance and accounting and proprietary software system navigation, which led to over 20 E-Learning online test and tutorial courses.
• Utilized software that included: Adobe CC 2019 After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator, Audition and Premiere.   Hand drew illustrations for custom projects.

• Created 2D and 3D graphics for 16 NBC and Telemundo television stations.  Provided graphic design and animation in up to 16 design formats using Adobe CC and Cinema 4D software.
• Revised layouts from existing and conceptual artwork to ensure brands retained accuracy, integrity and consistency of message.
• Facilitated the management of the digital assets library including maintenance, process flow, improvements, file management and archive systems.
• Provided customer service for 20 broadcast television stations via email, phone calls and instant messaging.  Service included but not limited to: Motion Graphics and graphic design work.
• Designed graphics and animations in a deadline-driven environment to ensure client deliverables.

LanguageCompetencies.FoundInContext: BILINGUAL Fluent in English and Spanish
BILINGUAL Fluent in English and Spanish [AND] Advertising Minors in Art and Spanish

Achievements: 2015		AVA Digital Gold Award for Animations.  Texas Tech University Athletics Department
2014	Telly Award for Use of Animation.  Major League Baseball Opening Day

QualificationsSummary:
SKILLS


BILINGUAL   Fluent in English and Spanish
DESIGN AND ANIMATION
• Adobe Software CC 2019 using Photoshop, Lightroom, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere, Media Encoder, Audition, InDesign, Curious Maps and Cinema 4D.
• Motion Graphics animations in 2D and 3D using Adobe CC 2019 After Effects and Cinema 4D.
• Create/revise graphic templates from existing and conceptual artwork.
• Digital photography and photo editing using Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom.
• Digital file management and archiving.
• Design on both Mac and PC platforms.
• Microsoft Office PowerPoint, Excel and Word.
• Pre-Production and Post Production of videos.
• 10 years' experience with Live Caricature Drawing and custom hand drawings.
